title: ADC Looking for Support For Duo Bronze/Silver
body:
AD Main looking for sup duo

Mic needed + doesn't tilt (within reason).

replies.body:
Sup dude, i'm just a mad chiller tryna get outta bronze, placements fucked me.
sup main and will die for your sins. 
i main thresh, but can play most sups if needed good at blitz and braum aswelll
aggressive play style{{champion:412}}

Hey,

I am currently Bronze 5 however I believe I should be higher due to poor placement games. Happy to duo norms first to check synergy.
I play Thresh, Braum, Leona, Naut and Trundle

I am currently Silver 2 (0LP) and used to be a pretty decent support main! i still know  thing or two if you are interested :D i can play {{champion:53}}, {{champion:98}}, {{champion:57}}, {{champion:412}}, {{champion:16}} and {{champion:99}} support
